text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I spend my days being as good a<n>trainer as I can be for
Maruzensky,<n>and before long, the time comes for<n>her
debut race.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Have you come all this<n>way to see me off?
Hehe, how kind of<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer! Have you come all this<n>way to see me off?
Hehe, how kind of<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm just bombdiggity. ♪ The weather<n>today is wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You know, the wind I feel when I run<n>is really special. So
I'm going to take it<n>all in and have a great race.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: See you when it's over!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her smile unwavering, she fully<n>utilizes her talents in the
race.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're at the last turn and<n>Maruzensky's still in the lead!
She<n>hasn't given up an inch since the<n>start!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I can go faster than this!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky's speeding up! She's<n>left the pack in the dust!
She<n>outclasses the competition, and she<n>knows it!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky still has a huge lead,<n>and... she clears the finish
line! Her<n>debut race ends in an overwhelming<n>victory!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A moment later, the awestruck<n>murmurs of the crowd rise to
a roar.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm back, Trainer. ♪ Shall we get<n>going—

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I'm back, Trainer. ♪ Shall we get<n>going—

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: This is it... Your day is finally here! The<n>day of your debut!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Right! I know I'm going to win! This is<n>the first step on the
road to becoming<n>a Triple Crown Champion!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! I know you can do it!<n>Put all that training to
good use and<n>win!

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Yeeeah!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hm? Oh, it's nothing...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, that's all for today once we get<n>back to the academy,
right? Do you<n>have any plans after?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hey, that's all for today once we get<n>back to the academy,
right? Do you<n>have any plans after?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: If you're not too busy... How about a<n>drive?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Mhm. You're okay, right? Great, I'll<n>come pick you up! Wait
for me at the<n>school entrance, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As per Maruzensky's instructions, I<n>wait for her at the
entrance when...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Vrrrooom! Screeeech...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hi, Trainer. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hi, Trainer. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky gets out of her sporty,<n>cherry red car and
walks over to me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, what's that look on your face for?
choice_data_list: That's some ride you got there...
That's some ride you got there...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I knooow! Isn't she the best?! This<n>little beauty's my
partner, Tata!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
A sleek, cool body with an engine that<n>roars like a tiger...
And check out the<n>scissor doors. Aren't they fabulous?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Nothing feels better than riding in this<n>baby! You're gonna
love it, so hurry!<n>Get in!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I take a seat in Maruzensky's<n>beloved "partner".

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
The acceleration! The flowing<n>scenery! Isn't this the best?!
But you<n>still haven't seen how bad to the<n>bone Tata really
is!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry—I follow the rules of the<n>road! Except... I take
them to the limit!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: VROOOOOM!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I have a terrifying time that seems to<n>last forever.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, that was great! And ending a<n>freewheeling drive at
the beach... How<n>romantic!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: How was it? I bet riding in Tata was<n>like a taste of heaven!
choice_data_list: I certainly feel like I almost ascended to heaven...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: How was it? I bet riding in Tata was<n>like a taste of heaven!
choice_data_list: I certainly feel like I almost ascended to heaven...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Good, I'm so glad you enjoyed it. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Driving's wonderful. You let your<n>body be taken by the
speed and<n>become one with the wind. It's like<n>you can
keep going forever.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Being able to experience that joy<n>with my own body... I'm
so happy I<n>was born an Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
And the thrill of speeding faster than<n>the wind... There's
nothing like it!
choice_data_list: You really love going fast, huh?
You really love going fast, huh?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You know it! But that's really all there<n>is to it for me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Most racers have some dream to<n>fulfill or goal to boast
about. But such<n>complicated matters... they're not for<n>girls
like me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Don't get me wrong. I love running<n>and racing, you know?
It's just...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Today when I was next to so many<n>big dreamers, I caught
myself<n>wondering if I'm... in the right place.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh no! Am I being a downer?! That<n>won't do for our first
drive together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh no! Am I being a downer?! That<n>won't do for our first
drive together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I know! Since we're at the beach,<n>how about a little
game of tag? You<n>know, like those scenes they have in<n>
the trendy TV soaps!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Okay, you're "it"! Ahaha, catch me if<n>you caaan! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just a girl without lofty dreams or<n>goals... It feels as though I
got to peek<n>under the hood and take a look at<n>who she
truly is behind that<n>precocious smile.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, hahaha! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thud, thud, thud!
choice_data_list: Wait, there's no way I'll ever catch you!
Wait, there's no way I'll ever catch you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come on, you never know till you try!<n>Keep at it, Trainer! ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come on, you never know till you try!<n>Keep at it, Trainer! ♪
